name: inSanidade
description:
This game was made for a brazilian game jam called Game Jaaj 6. It's my third game, and the first one that i try to put some voice. The characters, npcs and the enviroment assets was modelled and texturized in 4 days and the logic, coding and voice acting was made in the 4 days that left. 

This game was made in UPBGE (blender).
